summary: Adds stand-alone craftable silver bows and silver arrows.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=4]V1.3 - Bug Fix[/size][/b]
- Fixed projectile error. Path to the .nif file was to an incorrect, non-existent file.
Sorry about that! Should work properly now.

[b][size=4]V1.2 - Bug Fixes[/size][/b]
[u]SBSA[/u]
- Deleted duplicate Smithing entries
- Properly linked models, should now show correctly both in inventory/smithing menus and on the player.
[u]Bow Pack 1 - V1.1[/u]
- Fixed crafting recipe for Silver Hunting Bow, should now correctly output.
[u]Learned:[/u]
Don't mod when tired.

[b][size=4]V1.1 - Update[/size][/b]
-Arrows will now do more damage to undead, ghosts and werewolves. [b](Script work by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/4427352]FortuneQuacker[/url])[/b]
-Fixed Flashing present in Beta V1.1, there is no longer a visual effect.
-Arrows are now craftable at the forge. (Herp-Derped on that originally.)

[b][size=4]V1.0 -(Silver Bows and Silver Arrows Set)[/size][/b]
[b]Two Bows Available (Reskinned Dwarven):[/b]
Gilded Silver Bow
True Silver Bow
--They have Dwarven Bow stats, ignore normal weapon resistances, and should do more damage to Undead.
Require no skill to craft, but need Arcane ability to Temper.

[b]Three Quivers Available (Reskinned Steel):[/b]
Ornate Black Quiver
Ornate Brown Quiver
Leather Quiver
--They have Steel Arrow stats, ignore normal weapon resistances and do more damage to undead.
Require no skill to craft.

[b][size=4]Miscellaneous[/size][/b]
[b][u]Bow Pack 1[/u][/b]
Imperial Silver Bow - All Silver
Imperial Silvered Bow - Silver ornamentation, mostly wood.
Silver Hunting Bow - All Silver
Silvered Hunting Bow - Silver ornamentation, mostly wood.
All leather grips for these bows improved.

I might do some more pretty reskins of other quivers and bows. I'm open to ideas.
See sticky post on the comments page for notes on my 'To Do' list.

[b]Optional Fixes Available:[/b] (Can only choose one or the other.)
Using Option A '[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5164/?tab=3&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmodimages%2F%3Fuser%3D0%26id%3D5164]Proper Length Arrows[/url]' models by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/115378]Madcat221[/url]
or
Using Option B '[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5711]Closer Quivers and Longer Arrows[/url]' models by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1900560]EvilDeadAsh34[/url]

[b][u]Complementary Mod[/u]:[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32848/]Crypt Hero Armor[/url] by Me

[b][size=4]Thank you very much for your endorsements! :D[/size][/b]
author: Cat_Woman1989

files.name: Fix A - Proper Length Arrows Fix
